title: REI Co-op Trail 25 Pack - Men's
description: Sized just right for day hikes, commuting and carry-on travel, the men's REI Co-op Trail 25 pack holds plenty of gear, keeps it well organized and rides light and comfy on your back.

title: REI Co-op Trail 25 Pack - Women's
description: Light and comfy on your back, the women's REI Co-op Trail 25 pack holds plenty of gear and keeps it well organized for day hikes, commuting and carry-on travel.

title: REI Co-op Flash 22 Pack
description: Lean, clean and well-appointed, the 14 oz. REI Co-op Flash 22 gives you a removable back pad, waist and sternum straps—even a hydration sleeve—real comfort for a long day hike or summit push.

title: REI Co-op Trail 40 Pack - Men's
description: Built for comfort, the REI Co-op Trail 40 pack holds plenty of gear for day hikes, overnights and travel. It gives you easy access to your stuff and has tons of handy organizer pockets.

title: REI Co-op Trail 40 Pack - Women's
description: Ideal for day hikes, overnights and travel, the strong and comfortable women's REI Co-op Trail 40 pack offers easy access to your gear, tons of organizer pockets and a comfortable carry.

title: REI Co-op Trail 40 Pack - Women's
description: Ideal for day hikes, overnights and travel, the strong and comfortable women's REI Co-op Trail 40 pack offers easy access to your gear, tons of organizer pockets and a comfortable carry.

title: REI Co-op Tarn 12 Pack - Kids'
description: This is a real pack—not a toy. That's why the kids' REI Co-op Tarn 12 pack gets youngsters excited to hit the trail carrying their own stuff in their own pack.

title: REI Co-op Tarn 18 Pack - Kids'
description: Turn your aspiring young hiker loose on the trail with the durable REI Co-op Tarn 18 daypack. They'll love the kid-specific comfort, thoughtful design and variety of pockets.

title: REI Co-op Trailbreak 60 Pack - Men's
description: Roomy enough for a weekend and comfortable enough for long hikes, the men's REI Co-op Trailbreak 60 pack is built to last for years, and then you can hand it down—it adjusts to fit most bodies.

title: REI Co-op Flash 18 Pack - Pride Graphic Edition
description: Ultralight, comfy to carry and roomy enough to hold the Ten Essentials (and more) the REI Co-op Flash 18 Pride Edition pack makes hikes, travel and your daily commute feel like a walk in the park.

title: REI Co-op Traverse 32 Pack - Men's
description: A durable, comfortable and well-organized workhorse, the men's REI Co-op Traverse 32 pack keeps you supplied for everything from ultralight overnighters to epic day hikes.

title: REI Co-op Traverse 32 Pack - Women's
description: Keeping you supplied for everything from ultralight overnighters to epic day hikes, the women's REI Co-op Traverse 32 pack is a durable, comfortable and well-organized workhorse.

title: REI Co-op Flash 18 Pack
description: Simple, clean and functional, the REI Co-op Flash 18 daypack is just 9.5 oz., yet roomy enough to hold the Ten Essentials (and more), comfy enough to carry all day, and even hydration compatible.

title: REI Co-op Flash 18 Pack
description: Simple, clean and functional, the REI Co-op Flash 18 daypack is just 9.5 oz., yet roomy enough to hold the Ten Essentials (and more), comfy enough to carry all day, and even hydration compatible.

title: Osprey Kestrel 48 Pack - Men's
description: Carry your gear off the beaten path and into the rugged backcountry with the help of the men's Osprey Kestrel 48 pack. This versatile pack is ready for any and all of your outdoor adventures.

title: Osprey Kestrel 48 Pack - Men's
description: Carry your gear off the beaten path and into the rugged backcountry with the help of the men's Osprey Kestrel 48 pack. This versatile pack is ready for any and all of your outdoor adventures.

title: Cotopaxi Luzon 24L Pack - Del Dia
description: A big brother to the do-it-all, 18-liter Luzon, the Cotopaxi Luzon Del Dia 24-liter pack offers everything you love about the Luzon, plus added capacity and a few extra features.

title: Cotopaxi Luzon 24L Pack - Del Dia
description: A big brother to the do-it-all, 18-liter Luzon, the Cotopaxi Luzon Del Dia 24-liter pack offers everything you love about the Luzon, plus added capacity and a few extra features.

title: REI Co-op Tarn 65 Pack - Kids'
description: Thanks to the adjustable torso and hipbelt, the REI Co-op Tarn 65 pack grows with kids, teens and tweens—and their love of hiking! And its breathable, padded back makes long hauls comfy, too.

title: REI Co-op Tarn 65 Pack - Kids'
description: Thanks to the adjustable torso and hipbelt, the REI Co-op Tarn 65 pack grows with kids, teens and tweens—and their love of hiking! And its breathable, padded back makes long hauls comfy, too.

title: Osprey Kyte 36 Pack - Women's
description: Designed and built as a durable workhorse, the women's Osprey Kyte 36 pack eagerly carries gear off the beaten path into rugged, unpredictable backcountry terrain.

title: Osprey Kyte 46 Pack - Women's
description: Rich with practical features, the women's Osprey Kyte 46 pack is a durable workhorse that's ready to carry your gear off the beaten path into rugged, unpredictable backcountry terrain.

title: Osprey Talon 22 Pack - Men's
description: Bring hydration, food and extra layers along wherever your imagination takes you with the men's Osprey Talon 22 pack, your new favorite day-hiking, biking or peak-bagging carry solution.

title: REI Co-op Traverse 60 Pack - Women's
description: From fit to features, the women's Traverse 60 pack was born from our extensive field research. The result: burly durability, easy adjustability, improved comfort and just-in-case versatility.

title: Deuter Trail 28 SL Pack - Women's
description: Built for alpine hikers and climbers who explore at the highest altitudes, the women's Deuter Trail 28 SL pack is lightweight and comfortable, yet durable enough for your toughest adventures.

title: Gregory Nano 18 H2O Hydration Pack
description: A handy companion for a spontaneous hike, music festival or busy weekend, the Gregory Nano 18 H2O hydration pack hauls all of your must-haves—and 3 liters of water—when you're out and about.

title: Gregory Nano 22 H2O Hydration Pack
description: Ideal for quick-strike missions to catch the sunset or a weekend at your favorite mountain music fest, the Gregory Nano 22 H2O hydration pack hauls your gear for the day plus 3 liters of water.

title: Osprey Talon 36 Pack - Men's
description: Adept at day trips, ultralight overnighters and even bikepacking, the Osprey Talon 36 pack is designed for dynamic body movement with a continuous-wrap harness and hipbelt that moves with you.

title: Osprey Ariel 65 UL Stuff Pack Bundle - Women's
description: Haul heavy loads for a week or a gear-intensive weekend with the customizable fit of the women's Osprey Ariel 65 pack. This bundle includes an 18-liter Osprey Ultralight Stuff Pack.

title: REI Co-op Flash 55 Pack - Men's
description: Loaded for a week or stripped down for an overnighter, the men's REI Co-op Flash 55 pack keeps your load stable and steady. Seamlessly integrated suspension makes your hike cool and comfortable.

title: Osprey Atmos AG 65 Pack - Men's
description: You might forget how much you really packed with the men's Osprey Atmos AG 65 pack. Built for longer trips or heavyweight weekends, it delivers comfort and ventilation with 3D-suspended mesh.

title: Osprey Poco LT Child Carrier
description: Don't wait for the weekend to adventure with your little one. Ideal for tight stores, busy sidewalks and shorter hikes, the Osprey Poco LT child carrier helps you share everyday adventures, too.

title: Osprey Hydraulics Reservoir - 3 Liters
description: The 3-liter Osprey Hydraulics reservoir is ideal for large-volume packs and long-duration activities.

title: Osprey Aura AG 65 Pack - Women's
description: You might forget how much you really packed with the women's Osprey Aura AG 65 pack. Built for longer trips or heavyweight weekends, it delivers comfort and ventilation with 3D-suspended mesh.

title: REI Co-op Tarn 40 Pack - Kids'
description: Made for the growing hiker, the adaptable kids' REI Co-op Tarn 40 pack can change shape thanks to compression straps, a removable top lid and an adjustable back panel for a variety of torso lengths.

title: Gregory 3D Hydro Reservoir - 3 Liters
description: Thanks to its soft molded 3D design, the 3-liter Gregory 3D Hydro Reservoir works like a reservoir and dries like a bottle. Its generous capacity and convenient features make it a go-to on the trail.

title: REI Co-op Trail 2 Waist Pack
description: Great for keeping snacks and sunscreen handy on a hike, the REI Co-op Trail 2 waist pack also has a secret pocket for your cash and passport that makes it excellent for travel.

title: Gregory Maya 16 Pack - Women's
description: Head out for a quick day hike or lightning-fast summit with the women's Gregory Maya 16 pack. Its snug, ergonomic fit sits close to your body as you scramble from boulder field to trail.

title: Gregory 3D Hydro Reservoir - 2 Liters
description: The unique, soft-molded design of the 2-liter Gregory 3D Hydro reservoir provides comfort and stability on the trail and dries quickly thanks to the integrated hanger.

title: Osprey Sirrus 24 Pack - Women's
description: The slimmed-down Osprey Sirrus 24 pack is built for light day travel on tough terrain with a women-specific fit, load-distributing suspension system and plenty of organizational features.

title: Deuter Kid Comfort Child Carrier
description: Take the whole family on mountain adventures with the Deuter Kid Comfort child carrier. It offers easy carrying, keeps parents' backs fully ventilated and has plenty of rest options for passengers.

title: REI Co-op Trailbreak 60 Pack - Women's
description: You're set to tackle weekend trips and long hikes with the comfortable women's REI Co-op Trailbreak 60 pack. It's built to last for years, and then you can hand it down—it adjusts to fit most bodies.

title: Osprey Manta 34 Hydration Pack - Men's
description: Trek the path less traveled with all of your essentials on hand. The men's Osprey Manta 34 hydration pack helps you carry your gear and keep the H2O flowing while you get your boots dirty.

title: REI Co-op Lightweight Compression Stuff Sack
description: You can live with less or get a bigger pack—or use the REI Co-op Lightweight Compression stuff sack to compact your sleeping bag so it takes up less space. Now you have room for your espresso maker!

title: REI Co-op Lightweight Compression Stuff Sack
description: You can live with less or get a bigger pack—or use the REI Co-op Lightweight Compression stuff sack to compact your sleeping bag so it takes up less space. Now you have room for your espresso maker!

title: Sea to Summit Lightweight Dry Sacks - Set of 3
description: Stay organized on your adventures with this set of 3 Sea to Summit Lightweight dry sacks. With 4-liter, 8-liter and 13-liter sacks, this set is a must-have whether you're paddling or backpacking.

title: Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Compression Dry Sack
description: The lightweight, waterproof Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil® Compression Dry Sack compresses your clothing and gear to 1/3 the volume while keeping it dry.

title: REI Co-op Duck's Back Rain Cover - Medium
description: The Medium REI Co-op Duck's Back rain cover takes little space in your pack, but covers the whole thing when clouds gather. Its seam-sealed, waterproof shell protects your pack from the rain.

title: REI Co-op Pack Duffel Bag
description: The REI Co-op Pack duffel bag encloses your backpack or child carrier for protection from rough handling during air, train and auto travel.

title: Osprey Skimmer 16 Hydration Pack - Women's
description: Built to take you from trailhead to summit and back, the Osprey Skimmer 16 hydration pack has a women-specific fit for comfortable carrying and a 2.5-liter reservoir that ensures you don't go thirsty.

title: Peak Design Travel Pack 45 L
description: A versatile, durable carry-on, the 45-liter Peak Design Travel backpack is driven by one simple truth—no two trips are the same. Its features adapt to your needs from moment to moment.

title: Peak Design Everyday Backpack V2 30L
description: Made for easy access, organization, expansion and protection, the durable and sustainably built Peak Design Everyday Backpack V2 30L lets you haul your camera gear or everyday essentials in comfort.

title: Gregory Maven 65 Pack - Women's
description: Ready to follow the trail on a multiday adventure? The women's Gregory Maven 65 pack boasts an adjustable fit, a breathable back panel and ample pockets to make the long haul feel easy.

title: Gregory Maven 55 Pack - Women's
description: Delivering light weight and much-needed comfort, the women's Gregory Maven 55 pack features a breathable FreeFloat suspension with dynamic flex panels that follow the natural movements of your body.

title: Osprey Aether 55 Pack - Men's
description: When you're hauling weight for days in the wild, the durable, lightweight design and fine-tuned, customizable fit of the men's Osprey Aether 55 pack help you to carry the load in comfort.

title: Osprey Hydraulics LT Reservoir - 2.5 Liters
description: The 2.5-liter Osprey Hydraulics LT reservoir is made for light and fast activities where weight and balance (and hydration) are critical.

title: Gregory Baltoro 75 Pack - Men's
description: Head on happily down the trail, even with a heavy load. The Gregory Baltoro 75 pack adapts to your body shape and movement for comfort on long trips with lots of food—or short trips with lots of gear.

title: Gregory Zulu 65 Pack - Men's
description: Combining week-long volume with a streamlined profile and ventilated, adjustable FreeFloat suspension, the men's Gregory Zulu 65 pack offers year-round hauling for your backcountry adventures.

title: Peak Design Everyday Backpack V2 20L
description: Durably and sustainably built for easy access, organization, expansion and protection, the Peak Design Everyday Backpack V2 20L lets you haul your camera gear or everyday essentials in comfort.

title: Osprey Stratos 24 Pack - Men's
description: The slimmed-down Osprey Stratos 24 men's pack is built for light travel on tough terrain with a load-distributing suspension system, panel-loading convenience and plenty of organizational features.

title: Osprey Eja 58 Pack - Women's
description: When every ounce matters—but you still need more than just a sack with shoulder straps—the women's Osprey Eja 58 pack offers a supportive carry when resupplies are few and far between.

title: CamelBak Crux 3L Reservoir - 3 Liters
description: The CamelBak Crux 3-liter reservoir delivers high-flow hydration and features an ergonomic handle for easier refilling and an on/off lever at the bite valve that makes it easy to prevent leaks.

title: Gregory Miwok 24 Pack - Men's
description: Designed for active trail pursuits but capable of much more, the men's Gregory Miwok 24 pack combines flexible BioSync ventilated suspension with the volume and features you want in a daypack.

title: Sea to Summit eVent Compression Dry Sack
description: This valve-free compression dry sack uses a breathable base made of eVent™ waterproof fabric that allows air to be pushed out, but keeps water from entering.

title: Cotopaxi Batac 16 L Del Dia Pack
description: Unstructured and stowable, the Cotopaxi Batac 16 L Del Dia pack is a great choice for spontaneous day trips—whether you're heading downtown or down a trail.

title: Osprey Poco Child Carrier
description: Whether you're headed to a festival, farmers market or a few miles into the woods, make it a family affair with the Osprey Poco child carrier.

title: Osprey Stratos 34 Pack - Men's
description: Take on a big day in the men's Osprey Stratos 34 pack. With panel-loading ease and ample organizational features, it's equipped to support you and your gear on and off the beaten path.

title: Osprey Sportlite 25 Pack
description: Looking for a minimalist, technical daypack to stash your 10 essentials plus a few extras? The Osprey Sportlite 25 pack is a reliable option for active hikers needing a pack for a day out exploring.

title: Osprey Skimmer 28 Hydration Pack - Women's
description: Stay happy and hydrated on the trail with the women's Osprey Skimmer 28 hydration pack. It comfortably carries a day's worth of water and supplies.

title: Deuter Aircontact Core 65 + 10 Pack - Men's
description: Need a pack that can handle a weekend trip this month and a longer trek the next? The men's Deuter Aircontact Core 65 + 10 pack offers comfort and versatility for thru-hikers and backpackers.

title: MYSTERY RANCH Terraframe 3-Zip 50 Pack - Men's
description: Haul multiple days' worth of gear comfortably into the backcountry with the men's MYSTERY RANCH Terraframe 3-Zip 50 pack. It offers extra load-carrying capability between the pack bag and frame.

title: Osprey Hydraulics LT Reservoir - 1.5 Liters
description: The 1.5-liter Osprey Hydraulics LT reservoir is made for light and fast activities where weight and balance (and hydration) are critical.

title: Osprey Exos 48 Pack - Men's
description: When every ounce matters but you still want a supportive carry, the men's Osprey Exos 48 is just the ticket for your backpacking adventures, committing thru-hikes and fast-and-light adventures.

title: Exped Splash 15 Pack
description: Originally designed for river swimming, the Exped Splash 15 pack provides waterproof protection for your gear in nearly any situation; plus, at the weight of a chocolate bar, it's easy to take along.

title: Osprey Hydraulics Cleaning Kit
description: When your hydration system needs de-funking, the Osprey Hydraulics Reservoir cleaning kit is the only answer: it has everything you need to clean and maintain your reservoir and tubing.

title: MYSTERY RANCH Coulee 25 Pack - Men's
description: With a 3-zipper design that opens wide for easy packing and access, the men's MYSTERY RANCH Coulee 25 pack makes your day hikes more fun and comfortable than ever.

title: REI Co-op Duck's Back Rain Cover - XS
description: Seam-sealed and waterproof, the X-Small REI Co-op Duck's Back rain cover packs down small and deploys quickly to let the rain roll right off your pack.

title: Gregory Juno 24 H2O Hydration Pack - Women's
description: Big enough to stash your gear for a full-day trail loop, the women's Juno 24 H2O hydration pack comes with a 3 L reservoir and a ventilated back panel so you can stay cool and hydrated on the move.

title: Deuter Aircontact Core 60 + 10 SL Pack - Women's
description: Need a pack that can handle a weekend trip this month and a longer trek the next? The women's Deuter Aircontact Core 60 + 10 SL pack offers comfort and versatility for thru-hikers and backpackers.

title: MYSTERY RANCH Terraframe 65 Pack - Men's
description: Made for mountain enthusiasts who need options when going big, the men's MYSTERY RANCH Terraframe 65 pack is an expandable load hauler that's ready for your most epic adventures.

title: Osprey Kestrel 38 Pack - Men's
description: You'll be eagerly carrying gear off the beaten path and into rugged, unpredictable backcountry terrain with this feature-rich and durable, men's Osprey Kestrel 38 pack.

title: Osprey UltraLight Pack Raincover - Large
description: Protect your gear and stay visible in inclement, low-light conditions with the large Osprey UltraLight pack raincover, built to cover packs from 50 to 75 liters.

title: Osprey Atmos AG 50 Pack - Men's
description: How much weight did you really pack? You might forget with the men's Osprey Atmos AG 50 pack. Built for weekend trips, it delivers comfort and ventilation with 3D-suspended mesh.

title: Arc'teryx Aerios 30 Pack - Men's
description: Sometimes you're done in a day, and sometimes you extend the adventure. Luckily for you, the men's Arc'teryx Aerios 30 pack goes with you either way. It's sized just right for a bit of spontaneity.

title: Gregory Zulu 40 Pack - Men's
description: Large enough for supplies for 2 on sunup-to-sundown adventures, the generously sized yet agile men's Gregory Zulu 40 pack can even work for nights in the wild when the gear list is shorter than usual.

title: REI Co-op Durable Stuff Sack
description: The REI Co-op Durable stuff sack comes in several sizes—from double-sleeping-bag size to one-pair-of-running-shoes size—each a different color so you can find what you need without opening every bag.

title: Deuter Aircontact Core 45 + 10 SL Pack - Women's
description: Need a pack that can handle an overnight this month and a longer trip the next? The women's Deuter Aircontact Core 45 + 10 SL pack offers comfort and versatility for thru-hikers and backpackers.

title: REI Co-op Trail 5 Waist Pack
description: Load up for a day on the trail and leave your backpack at home. The REI Co-op Trail 5 waist pack holds 10 essentials and beyond—plus there's a secret passport pocket on back for cross-border treks.

title: REI Co-op Ditty Sack - Set of 3
description: At home you've got cupboards and drawers. In camp, you have—stuff sacks! This set of 3 REI Co-op Ditty Sacks helps you to organize and declutter on the trail and in camp.

title: Mountain Hardwear AMG 75 Pack
description: Made for mountaineering and skimo, the Mountain Hardwear AMG 75 pack delivers generous space for multiday trips in any season. It stands up to tough terrain while keeping your load maneuverable.
